API description: Converts a given date to a specified timezone using the DateClock API and returns the response.

format.description: Specifies the format of the output date. Defaults to None.

date.description: The date to be converted. Defaults to '7 Days Ago'.

tz.description: The target timezone for the date conversion. Defaults to 'UTC+8'.
